com.ginrummy

Class XMLLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ginrummy.XMLLoader

  • public class XMLLoader
extends java.lang.Object
    The XMLLoader class provides methods for saving and loading Gin Rummy game data and player moves to and from XML files.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      XMLLoader()

      Saves a Gin Rummy game to an XML file.

    • Method Detail

      • saveGameToXML

        public static void saveGameToXML(java.lang.String filePath,
                                 GinRummyGame ginRummyGame)
                          throws java.io.IOException
        Saves a Gin Rummy game to an XML file.
        Parameters:
        filePath - The path to the XML file where the game will be saved.
        ginRummyGame - The Gin Rummy game to be saved.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If there is an issue with writing to the XML file.

      • loadGameFromXML

        public static GinRummyGame loadGameFromXML(java.lang.String filePath)
                                    throws java.io.IOException
        Loads a Gin Rummy game from an XML file.
        Parameters:
        filePath - The path to the XML file from which the game will be loaded.
        Returns:
        The loaded Gin Rummy game.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If there is an issue with reading from the XML file.

      • saveMovesToXML

        public static void saveMovesToXML(java.lang.String filePath,
                                  java.util.List<com.ginrummy.Models.Player> players)
        Saves a list of player moves to an XML file.
        Parameters:
        filePath - The path to the XML file where player moves will be saved.
        players - The list of players whose moves will be saved.

      • loadMovesFromXML

        public static java.util.List<com.ginrummy.Models.Player> loadMovesFromXML(java.lang.String filePath)
                                                                   throws java.io.IOException
        Loads a list of player moves from an XML file.
        Parameters:
        filePath - The path to the XML file from which player moves will be loaded.
        Returns:
        The loaded list of players with their moves.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If there is an issue with reading from the XML file.
